titleStmt.title: Gods holy mind touching matters morall which himselfe vttered in tenne words, or tenne commandements. Also Christs holy mind touching prayer, deliuered in that most holy prayer, which himselfe taught vnto his disciples: discouered by the light of his owne holy writ, and deliuered by questions and answeres. By the late reuerend and faithfull preacher of Gods word, Mr. Edward Elton, Bachelour in Diuinitie, and pastor of Saint Mary Magdalens Barmondsey, neere London.
titleStmt.author: Elton, Edward, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] and I[ohn] N[orton] for Robert Mylbourne, and are to bee sold at his shop at the great south doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: "A plaine and easie exposition vpon the Lords Prayer in questions and answers" has separate pagination and title page dated 1624.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
